timeline.bodyText: Should we add the same helper method in the tagging feature? If so, could you add this feedback in the PR?
timeline.author: thiagotnunes

replies.bodyText:
I'm not sure whether you mean literally this helper method or a similar one for tagging. The latter is already in the PR:

  
    
      java-spanner/google-cloud-spanner/src/main/java/com/google/cloud/spanner/Options.java
    
    
         Line 81
      in
      c3be7ce
    
    
    
    

        
          
           public static ReadQueryUpdateTransactionOption tag(String name) { 
        
    
  


But I don't think we should add this specific helper method to the other PR. The two PR's are going to conflict, but I think that is something we should fix once one of them has been merged.
replies.author: olavloite

replies.bodyText: Oh sorry, I missed that from the other PR.
replies.author: thiagotnunes

timeline.message: feat: add support for RPC priority
cleanup: cleanup after merge + add additional tests
fix: remove merge conflict markers and cleanup
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:googleapis/java-spanner into rpc-priorities
